fields.name: core/form_about.html
fields.content:
{% load static %} {% load icf_extras %} {% block header %} {% endblock %}

About this form

What if I need more details about something in this form?

  • This form may have words you do not understand. You can ask research staff to read it with you.
  • Please ask any questions that will help you decide if you want to be in this study. If you decide to take part in the study, it should be because you really want to volunteer.
  • You are free to ask questions at any time. You can ask before, during, or after you are in the study.

About the research study

Who is leading this study?

The main researcher leader the study is:
Study Leader: {{pd.primary_contact.name}}, {{pd.primary_contact.title}}
Phone: {{pd.primary_contact.phone_number|phone}}
E-mail: {{pd.primary_contact.email}}

What is this study about?

{{pd.simple_study_explanation_question}}

Why am I being asked to be in this research study?

{{pd.study_why_asking_this_participant}}

About {{pd.number_in_study}} people will be part of this study.{% if pd.number_people_UAMS != pd.number_in_study %} Of those, about {{pd.number_people_UAMS}} will be part of the study at UAMS. The rest will take part at other sites.{% endif %}

How will study staff decide if I qualify to be in this study?

To decide if you are eligible to join the study, we will:

    {% list_values "determining_eligiblity" pd %}

What will happen if I qualify to be part of the research study?

{{pd.randomization_explanation_question}}

{% if pd.study_randomization %}

Depending on which study group you are in, you may complete these activities during the study:

{% else %}

If you qualify, you will complete these activities during the study:

{% endif %}
    {% for option in pd.Research_activity_options %} {% if option == "Answer survey questions" %}
  • Answer survey questions. {% if et.answer_every_question %}
    {{et.answer_every_question_required|safe}}{% endif %} {% if et.help_with_surveys %}
    {{et.help_with_surveys|safe}}{% endif %}
    • {% elif option == "Answer questions during interviews with study staff" %}
  • Answer questions during interviews with study staff.
    • {% else %}
  • {{option}}
    • {% endif %} {% endfor %}

Do I have to complete all parts of the study?

{% if pd.optional_parts_of_protocol %}

{{et.optional_parts_of_protocol}}

{% elif pd.optional_parts_of_protocol_explain_question %}

You have a choice to participate in some parts of this study. You can choose whether or not to:

    {% list_values "optional_parts_of_protocol_explain_question" pd %}
{% else %}

No. You do not need to complete all parts of the study.

{% endif %}

What will you do with my biospecimens (for example, blood and tissue samples)?

{% explain_text "genetic_data_centralized_databases" pd et %}

fields.name: core/form_content.html
core/form_confidentiality.html
core/form_default.html
core/form_genetics.html
core/form_key.html
fields.content:
{% load static %} {% load icf_extras %} {% block header %} {% endblock %}

Research Study Participant Consent Form

Study Title: {{pd.study_title}}

Study Leader: {{pd.primary_contact.name}}, {{pd.primary_contact.title}}

We are asking if you want to join a research study at {{pd.institution_conduting_question|first}}. This form will give you details to help you decide if you want to join. If you have questions about this form or the study, contact:

{{pd.primary_contact.title}} {{pd.primary_contact.name}}
Phone: {{pd.primary_contact.phone_number|phone}}
E-mail: {{pd.primary_contact.email}}

Key Information

This section gives you brief information about the study. Later in this form, we will give you more details to help you decide if you want to join. We will explain more about the risks and benefits of being in this study. And, we will give you more details about what to expect if you join.

What we hope to learn in the study

    {% list_value "simple_study_explanation_question" pd %} {% list_value "relevancy_of_research_question" pd %}

What we will ask you to do if you join the study

If you join, you will be in the study for about {{pd.length_of_study}}. You will be asked to do the study activities below. You can learn more about each of these later in this form.

    {% list_values "Research_activity_options" pd %}

Some reasons you may want to join the study

    {% list_values "Reasons_to_join_question" pd %}

Some reasons you may decide not to join the study

  • You may not wish to spend the time it would take to take part.
    • {% list_values "reason_NOT_to_join_question" pd %}

What to do now

  • If you do not want to join the study, tell the study staff. Remember, it is okay to say no. You can still get your medical care from UAMS if you are not in the study.
  • If you want to learn more about the study, read the rest of this form. Ask study staff for more information.

fields.name: core/form_manage.html
fields.content:
{% extends "base_header.html" %} {% block header_title %}{% endblock %} {% block content %}

{{cf.study_name}}

Answer Questions

Here you will answer questions about your study to help us build the consent form for you.

PDF Form

View the application output in your browser. From here you can save the document as a PDF or print.

Authorized Users

{% for email in cf.authorized_users.all %}
{{email.email}} {% if email.email != user.email %}
{% csrf_token %}
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}

Add Additional Authorized Users

{% if form.errors %}

{{form.errors}}

{% endif %}
{% csrf_token %}

If you would like to share your form with the developers for the purposes of improving the tool, please add share@icf.nav as an authorized user. You can remove this sharing at any time.

Duplicate Form

{% csrf_token %}

Recent Changes

{% for change in recent %}
{{change.question}}
{{change.user.email}}
{{change.last_change|timesince}}
{% endfor %}
{% if user.is_superuser %}
  • JSON Debug Page
{% endif %}
{% endblock %}

fields.name: core/form_other.html
fields.content:
{% load static %} {% load icf_extras %} {% block header %} {% endblock %}
{% if pd.additional_things_YN %}

Other things you should know about the study

{% explain_text "additional_things_YN" pd et %}

{% endif %}

Learn more

Where can I find more information about this clinical trial?

A description of this clinical trial will be available on http://www.ClinicalTrials.gov, as required by U.S. law. This website will not include information that can identify you. At most, the website will include a summary of the results. You can search this website any time.

What if I have questions?

Please call the head researcher of the study ({{pd.primary_contact.title}} {{pd.primary_contact.name}}) at {{pd.primary_contact.phone_number|phone}} if you:
  • Have any questions about this study
  • Have questions about your rights
  • Feel you have been injured in any way by being in this study

You can also call the UAMS Institutional Review Board. This is the office at UAMS that supervises research. You may want to call them if you cannot reach the study team or want to speak to someone not directly involved with this study. To do so, call 501-686-5667 during normal work hours.

Your decision about joining the study

What are the alternatives to being in this study?

Alternatives are other treatments you can get or other ways you can help with the research besides being in this study.

{{et.study_alternatives}}

{% explain_text "study_alternatives" pd et %}

What if I say no, I do not want to be in this study or do not qualify?

It is okay to say no to joining this study. You will not lose any services, benefits, or rights you would normally have at {% list_text "institution_conduting_question" pd %} if you decide not to join. If you decide to join the study, it should be because you really want to volunteer.

If you are a student at {% list_text "institution_conduting_question" pd %}, nothing about your academic status will change, no matter what you decide.

If you are an employee at {% list_text "institution_conduting_question" pd %}, nothing about your employment status will change, no matter what you decide.

What happens if I say yes and join the study, but change my mind later?

{% explain_text "voluntary_withdrawal" pd et %}

Can study staff take me out of the study even if I want to continue?

{% is_true "involuntary_withdrawal_YN" pd as study_remove %} {% if study_remove %}

Yes, the head researcher can take you out of the study if:

    {% list_values "involuntary_withdrawal_reasons" pd %}
{% else %}

No. You can not be removed from the study if you want to continue.

{% endif %}

By signing the document, I am saying:

  • I agree to be in the study.
  • I know that I do not have to join the study.
  • Someone has talked with me about the information in this form and answered all of my questions.
  • I have been asked if I wish to talk directly to the study leader.

I know that:

  • I can stop being in any and all parts of the study at any time and nothing bad will happen to me.
  • I can still get medical care at {% list_text "institution_conduting_question" pd %} no matter what I decide.
  • I can call the office that supervises research if I have any questions about the study or about my rights.
    UAMS Institutional Review Board: 501-686-5667
  • I do not give up any of my legal rights by signing this form.

I agree to be part of this study:

Your name (please print)

Your signature

Date

Printed name (staff obtaining consent)

Signature (staff obtaining consent)

Date

fields.name: core/form_reasons.html
fields.content:
{% load static %} {% load icf_extras %} {% block header %} {% endblock %}

What if I say yes but decide later to quit the study?

{{pd.leave_study_explain}}

Can someone else take me out of the study?

Yes, the study team can take you out of the study if:

    {% list_values "involuntarily_removed_reasons" pd %}
